data.title: The Top Artists Who Debuted in 2000
meta_keywords: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame
data.meta_description: Which artists had their debut recording in ?
data.text:
⇦ 1999 2001 ⇨

Top 13 Artists Who Released their Debut Recording in 2000

These artists released their first recording in 2000, which makes them eligible for the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame in 2025. All currently eligible artists are listed here. Artists aleady inducted in the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame can be found here.

1. Gorillaz2. Sufjan Stevens3. Linkin Park4. Pink5. The Knife6. Antony & the Johnsons7. Interpol8. Ryan Adams9. The New Pornographers10. Nelly11. Nelly Furtado12. Andrew WK13. Good Charlotte

Essential Debut Albums from 2000

Albums (?)Wikipedia3 Doors DownThe Better Life☆A Perfect CircleMer de Noms☆DisturbedThe Sickness☆Linkin ParkHybrid Theory☆NellyCountry Grammar☆Ryan AdamsHeartbreaker☆The New PornographersMass Romantic☆

Essential Debut Songs from 2000

Songs (?)Wikipedia3 Doors DownKryptonite☆A Perfect CircleJudith☆Dashboard ConfessionalScreaming infidelities☆DisturbedDown With the Sickness☆LifehouseHanging by a Moment☆Linkin ParkIn The End☆Linkin ParkCrawling☆Linkin ParkOne Step Closer☆NellyCountry Grammar☆Nelly FurtadoI'm Like a Bird☆

Missing someone? They may be listed in a different year. Check this list before letting us know.

⇦ 1999 2001 ⇨
